item.title: New Site
item.author: tyler.harms@gmail.com (Tyler Harms)
item.description: Obviously this is a new site yet again. I just got sick of working with PyroCMS and decided to go to good ‘ol Wordpress, for reliability sake. Luckily I happen to have a licence for an awesome theme, hence the awesome site design. Currently it is not customized but the theme is designed to be customized. Also the site has full access to all the awesome add-ons that wordpress developers have created. With 15% of all created sites out there being Wordpress sites, chances are somebody has thought of it first. What that means to me and possible clients, I can create sites fast and there is a large support structure to back up any work done.
